content:
food & drink at marholmen

restaurang skargardsro

Fresh air gives good appetite. The food is a big part of the experience here on the island and we want you to experience Marholmen with all the senses. Enjoy your breakfast, lunch or dinner overlooking the archipelago from the dining room window. Our large dining room Skargardsro is located in the main building of Marholmen. With the calm and fresh air, we hope you enjoy the meals.
